meanings.definition: The act of attending a theater performance.
meanings.sent1: Her theatergoings always bring a smile to her face.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy my theatergoings on weekends.
meanings.sent3: His theatergoings are like a fun adventure every time.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, theatergoings are like stepping into a magical world.
meanings.sent5: Theatergoings make the stories come alive before your eyes.

meanings.definition: The behavior or activities associated with attending the theater.
meanings.sent1: Theatergoings include buying tickets and finding your seat.
meanings.sent2: We planned our theatergoings for the entire month.
meanings.sent3: Their theatergoings involve dressing up in fancy clothes.
meanings.sent4: To her, theatergoings are a dance of excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent5: Theatergoings create a buzz of energy in the air.
